definition: coltsfoot (Tussilago farfara), plant in sunflower family Asteracae used a cough suppressant
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: When it rained, funny sounds came from the splashing raindrop on the butterbur leaf.
sentences.chinese: 下雨了，雨點濺在款冬葉子上發出好聽的聲音。

sentences.english: Two snails were living on a back of the butterbur leaves.
sentences.chinese: 有兩隻蝸牛住在款冬葉子的背面。

sentences.english: One day, they found a little snail crying on the back of a butterbur leaf.
sentences.chinese: 有天，他們發現有隻小蝸牛在一片款冬葉子後哭。

sentences.english: When it rained, funny sounds came from the splashing raindrops on the butterbur leaf.
sentences.chinese: 下雨的時候，雨滴飛濺到款冬葉上，發出好聽的聲音。

sentences.english: Butterbur leaves were historically used to wrap butter, giving this herb its name.
sentences.chinese: 款冬葉歷史上用來包裝黃油，這種草藥的名稱。

sentences.english: Butterbur and coltsfoot belong to two different genera of Compositae.
sentences.chinese: 蜂鬥菜與款冬則是菊科不同屬的兩種植物。

sentences.english: A snail was living on a back of a butterbur leaf.
sentences.chinese: 兩隻蝸牛一直生活在款冬葉上。

sentences.english: The two snails took him to a big special butterbur leaf where they were always living.
sentences.chinese: 兩隻蝸牛把他帶到他們一直生活的大款冬葉上。

definition: Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
Anemarrhena asphodeloides/rhyzome of Anemarrhena (used in TCM)
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
